title: VMware vCenter Server Appliance  External Control of File Path Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of VMware vCenter Server Appliance. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the processing of jsonrpc messages. A crafted request can trigger a file read operation of a blocking or slow character stream. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition on the system.
addtionnal_details: VMware has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2021-0020.html
timeline:
2021-05-26 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-09-22 - Coordinated public release of advisory
